name: Super Galaxy Runner
description: Super Galaxy Runner, is a fast paced endless runner, set in Space. The longer you are able to survive the stronger the enemies become and the more points you'll earn for defeating them. Super Galaxy Runner has several exciting features planned for updates coming soon. Such as, an upgrade system that you pay for using your score points, a high score leader board, boss enemies, and several other features. If you have feedback or would like to report a bug, don't hesitate to email teampandagames@gmail.com.
